ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
¼ cup roughly chopped spinach, or to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or to taste
1 slice mozzarella cheese, cut into cubes

cookingTips: Use parchment or foil to create a packet for delicate cod to prevent sticking and falling apart
Layer vegetables on foil, place cod on top, add cheese, then fold into packet for steamed results
Cook over medium heat until cod is opaque and flakes easily, approximately 10-12 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user how to use foil-packet grilling to cook delicate white fish gently while infusing it with flavors from vegetables.
